title: Mani Mostofi from Racetraitor
itunes:title: Mani Mostofi from Racetraitor
description:
Episode 336 - Variety is the spice of life and today, we have Mani Mostofi from politically charged hardcore band, Racetraitor. It’s a wide ranging discussion that tackles how he grew up in a politically infused scene, being a “big” band and being deliberate with your time. Enjoy! Visit Wiretap Records and use the code 100WORDS for $15 off your purchase! Hit up Rockabilia for all your merch needs and use the code PCJABBERJAW for 10% off your order. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
